1000 rem ==============================
1001 rem == caricatore basic per  64 ==
1002 rem ==            di leo  sorge ==
1003 rem ==============================
1010 :
2000 poke775,200:printchr$(147):b=55296
2010 read t: if t=0 then 3000
2020 s=t+194:poke s,81: poke b+s-1024,7
2030 goto 2010
2040 :
2200 data 1317,1318,1319,1321,1322,1323
2201 data 1327,1328,1329,1336,1337,1338
2202 data 1340,1356,1361,1363,1366,1368
2203 data 1370,1375,1380,1396,1401,1402
2204 data 1403,1406,1408,1410,1415,1416
2205 data 1417,1418,1420,1422,1436,1441
2206 data 1443,1446,1448,1450,1455,1458
2207 data 1460,1461,1462,1476,1481,1483
2208 data 1486,1490,1495,1498,1502,1517
2209 data 1518,1519,1521,1522,1523,1527
2210 data 1529,1536,1537,1542,0000
2300 :
3000 fort=0to2000:next:print chr$( 31)
3010 poke 631,131:poke 632,13:poke198,2 :end
